Home.Description: Welcome to LFMReviews! Share and read reviews about your teachers to improve the educational quality of your community.

FAQ.R1: LFMReviews is a website where you can write and read community reviews about different teachers in various grades and subjects at LFM.
FAQ.R2: Most teachers from 6th grade to Terminale are available. However, you can help us expand our list by sending us information about a teacher we haven't listed yet through the 'Add a Teacher' tab.
FAQ.Q3: Can people know who posted the review?
FAQ.R3: No, all reviews are anonymous, and no one will know who posted them. We ask for your email address only for database purposes and to prevent multiple account creation.
FAQ.Q4: Can people know who posted the review?
FAQ.R4: No, all reviews are anonymous, and no one will know who posted them. We ask for your email address only for database purposes and to prevent multiple account creation.

CompletedReview.Title: Thank you very much for your
CompletedReview.Explanation: Your review will be visible in about 10 minutes as it must go through an automatic validation process.

Auth.signup-paragraph: Join us and share your reviews now!
Auth.login-paragraph: Thank you for returning, we look forward to your new Reviews.
Auth.invalid-mail: The email address is not valid. Please check and try again.
Auth.invalid-password: The password must be at least 8 characters long, including alphanumeric and special characters. It should not contain a common password. Please try again.
Auth.not-corresponding-password: Passwords do not match. Please check and try again.
Auth.password-too-short: The password must be at least 8 characters long.
Auth.all-fields-required: You have not filled in all the fields.
Auth.email-used: This email address has already been used to create another account.

Cookies.cookie-acceptance: This website uses functional and third-party cookies to enhance your experience. You can choose to accept or decline these cookies. If you continue browsing without selecting an option, we will assume that you accept the use of cookies. To change your preferences, visit the Settings page. For more information, please see our

Teacher.no-rating: No reviews have been made for this teacher yet. Be the first!

CreateReview.respect: For more information, please visit the community rules.
CreateReview.chooseTeacher: To start, please choose the teacher you want to evaluate.
CreateReview.selectSubject: Next, select the subject this teacher teaches.
CreateReview.selectYear: In which year does this teacher teach?
CreateReview.startEvaluation: -Now we can start the evaluation. Please fill in the fields below.
CreateReview.yesOrNoQuestions: - Now please answer the next questions with yes or no
CreateReview.optionalComment: -You have the option to add a comment (optional). Any type of insult, threat, or other inappropriate behavior will not be tolerated.

Error.maintenance: Website maintenance will start in less than 5 minutes...
Error.fatal: An unknown error occurred. Please try again.
Error.duplicate-review: A review for this teacher, subject, and year has already been created by the user.
Error.collision: You have already created similar content.
Error.wrong-teacher: The selected teacher is invalid. Please choose a valid teacher.
Error.wrong-subject: The selected subject is invalid. Please choose a valid subject.
Error.wrong-year: The selected year is invalid. Please choose a valid year.
Error.incorrect-grade: The provided grade is incorrect. Grades must be between 0 and 10.
Error.incorrect-overall: The overall rating is incorrect. The overall rating must be between 0 and 10.
Error.wrong-login: No active account was found with the provided credentials. Check if you have verified your account via your email inbox.
Error.request-reset-password: The request was not completed. Please try again.
Error.404: The accessed page does not exist.
Error.teacher-query: An error occurred while searching for teachers.
Error.text-rating-forbidden-characters: The characters used (such as special characters and accents) in the review are not allowed.

Success.create-review: The review has been successfully created.
Success.signup: Your account has been successfully created. Check your email to activate it.
Success.login: You have successfully logged into your account.
Success.request-reset-password: The request was successful. Check your email.
